metadata.name: Delete Volume Shadow Copies via WMI with PowerShell - PS Script
metadata.comment: Deletes Windows Volume Shadow Copies with PowerShell code and Get-WMIObject. This technique is used by numerous ransomware families such as Sodinokibi/REvil

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('get-wmiobject')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('win32_shadowcopy')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('.delete()')))

output.summary: Deletes Windows Volume Shadow Copies with PowerShell code and Get-WMIObject. This technique is used by numerous ransomware families such as Sodinokibi/REvil
